text: Musi River (also called Musinuru or Muchukunda or Moosa) is a river in the Deccan Plateau flowing through Telangana state in India. The Musi River flows into the Krishna River. Hyderabad stands on the edge of Musi River, which divides the historic old city and the new city. Category:Rivers of India Category:Telangana
title: Musi River (India)
